GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns a type of the ApiRun class.

GetTextPr.name: GetTextPr
GetTextPr.description: Returns the text properties of the current run.

ClearContent.name: ClearContent
ClearContent.description: Clears the content from the current run.

RemoveAllElements.name: RemoveAllElements
RemoveAllElements.description: Removes all the elements from the current run.

AddText.name: AddText
AddText.description: Adds some text to the current run.

params.name: sText
params.description: The text which will be added to the current run.

AddPageBreak.name: AddPageBreak
AddPageBreak.description: Adds a page break and starts the next element from a new page.

AddLineBreak.name: AddLineBreak
AddLineBreak.description: Adds a line break to the current run position and starts the next element from a new line.

AddColumnBreak.name: AddColumnBreak
AddColumnBreak.description: Adds a column break to the current run position and starts the next element from a new column.

AddTabStop.name: AddTabStop
AddTabStop.description: Adds a tab stop to the current run.

AddDrawing.name: AddDrawing
AddDrawing.description: Adds a drawing object (image, shape or chart) to the current text run.

params.name: oDrawing
params.description: The object which will be added to the current run.

AddHyperlink.name: AddHyperlink
AddHyperlink.description: Adds a hyperlink to the current run.

params.name: sLink
params.description: The link address.

params.name: sScreenTipText
params.description: The screen tip text.

Copy.name: Copy
Copy.description: Creates a copy of the current run.

GetRange.name: GetRange
GetRange.description: Returns a Range object that represents the part of the document contained in the specified run.

params.name: Start
params.description: Start character in the current element.

params.name: End
params.description: End character in the current element.

GetParentContentControl.name: GetParentContentControl
GetParentContentControl.description: Returns a content control that contains the current run.

GetParentTable.name: GetParentTable
GetParentTable.description: Returns a table that contains the current run.

GetParentTableCell.name: GetParentTableCell
GetParentTableCell.description: Returns a table cell that contains the current run.

SetTextPr.name: SetTextPr
SetTextPr.description: Sets the text properties to the current run.

params.name: oTextPr
params.description: The text properties that will be set to the current run.

SetBold.name: SetBold
SetBold.description: Sets the bold property to the text character.

params.name: isBold
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed bold.

SetCaps.name: SetCaps
SetCaps.description: Specifies that any lowercase characters in the current text run are formatted for display only as their capital letter character equivalents.

params.name: isCaps
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed capitalized.

SetColor.name: SetColor
SetColor.description: Sets the text color for the current text run in the RGB format.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

params.name: isAuto
params.description: If this parameter is set to "true", then r,g,b parameters will be ignored.

SetDoubleStrikeout.name: SetDoubleStrikeout
SetDoubleStrikeout.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed with two horizontal lines through each character displayed on the line.

params.name: isDoubleStrikeout
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed double struck through.

SetFill.name: SetFill
SetFill.description: Sets the text color to the current text run.

params.name: oApiFill
params.description: The color or pattern used to fill the text color.

SetFontFamily.name: SetFontFamily
SetFontFamily.description: Sets all 4 font slots with the specified font family.

params.name: sFontFamily
params.description: The font family or families used for the current text run.

GetFontNames.name: GetFontNames
GetFontNames.description: Returns all font names from all elements inside the current run.

SetFontSize.name: SetFontSize
SetFontSize.description: Sets the font size to the characters of the current text run.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The text size value measured in half-points (1/144 of an inch).

SetHighlight.name: SetHighlight
SetHighlight.description: Specifies a highlighting color which is applied as a background to the contents of the current run.

params.name: sColor
params.description: Available highlight color.

SetItalic.name: SetItalic
SetItalic.description: Sets the italic property to the text character.

params.name: isItalic
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed italicized.

SetLanguage.name: SetLanguage
SetLanguage.description: Specifies the languages which will be used to check spelling and grammar (if requested) when processing the contents of this text run.

params.name: sLangId
params.description: The possible value for this parameter is a language identifier as defined by RFC 4646/BCP 47. Example: "en-CA".

SetPosition.name: SetPosition
SetPosition.description: Specifies an amount by which text is raised or lowered for this run in relation to the default baseline of the surrounding non-positioned text.

params.name: nPosition
params.description: Specifies a positive (raised text) or negative (lowered text) measurement in half-points (1/144 of an inch).

SetShd.name: SetShd
SetShd.description: Specifies the shading applied to the contents of the current text run.

params.name: sType
params.description: The shading type applied to the contents of the current text run.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetSmallCaps.name: SetSmallCaps
SetSmallCaps.description: Specifies that all the small letter characters in this text run are formatted for display only as their capital letter character equivalents which are two points smaller than the actual font size specified for this text.

params.name: isSmallCaps
params.description: Specifies if the contents of the current run are displayed capitalized two points smaller or not.

SetSpacing.name: SetSpacing
SetSpacing.description: Sets the text spacing measured in twentieths of a point.

params.name: nSpacing
params.description: The value of the text spacing measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetStrikeout.name: SetStrikeout
SetStrikeout.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed with a single horizontal line through the center of the line.

params.name: isStrikeout
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed struck through.

SetStyle.name: SetStyle
SetStyle.description: Sets a style to the current run.

params.name: oStyle
params.description: The style which must be applied to the text run.

SetUnderline.name: SetUnderline
SetUnderline.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed along with a line appearing directly below the character (less than all the spacing above and below the characters on the line).

params.name: isUnderline
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current run are displayed underlined.

SetVertAlign.name: SetVertAlign
SetVertAlign.description:
Specifies the alignment which will be applied to the contents of the current run in relation to the default appearance of the text run:

  • "baseline" - the characters in the current text run will be aligned by the default text baseline.
  • "subscript" - the characters in the current text run will be aligned below the default text baseline.
  • "superscript" - the characters in the current text run will be aligned above the default text baseline.

params.name: sType
params.description: The vertical alignment type applied to the text contents.

WrapInMailMergeField.name: WrapInMailMergeField
WrapInMailMergeField.description: Wraps a run in a mail merge field.

ToJSON.name: ToJSON
ToJSON.description: Converts the ApiRun object into the JSON object.

params.name: bWriteStyles
params.description: Specifies if the used styles will be written to the JSON object or not.

AddComment.name: AddComment
AddComment.description: Adds a comment to the current run. Please note that this run must be in the document.

params.name: sText
params.description: The comment text (required).

params.name: sAuthor
params.description: The author's name (optional).

GetText.name: GetText
GetText.description: Returns a text from the text run.

params.name: oPr
params.description: The resulting string display properties.

params.name: oPr.NewLineSeparator
params.description: Defines how the line separator will be specified in the resulting string.

params.name: oPr.TabSymbol
params.description: Defines how the tab will be specified in the resulting string.

SetTextFill.name: SetTextFill
SetTextFill.description: Sets the text fill to the current text run.

params.name: oApiFill
params.description: The color or pattern used to fill the text color.

SetOutLine.name: SetOutLine
SetOutLine.description: Sets the text outline to the current text run.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the text outline.

description: Class representing a small text block called 'run'.
